taskDescriptionTemplate: A few questions about how you perceive the future
taskTitleTemplate: Survey onyour attitude about the future
name: CFCS
overview: Answer the following questions about yourself.

questions.text: I consider how things might be in the future, and try to influence those things with my day to day behavior.
questions.smsText: I consider how things might be in the future, and try to influence those things with my day to day behavior. (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: Often I engage in a particular behavior in order to achieve outcomes that may not result for many years.
questions.smsText:
Often I engage in a particular behavior in order to achieve outcomes that may not result for many years.
 (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: I only act to satisfy immediate concerns, figuring the future will take care of itself.
questions.smsText: I only act to satisfy immediate concerns, figuring the future will take care of itself. (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: My behavior is only influenced by the immediate (i.e. a matter of days or weeks) outcomes of my actions.
questions.smsText:
My behavior is only influenced by the immediate (i.e. a matter of days or weeks) outcomes of my actions.
 (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: My convenience is a big factor in the decisions I make or the actions I take.
questions.smsText: My convenience is a big factor in the decisions I make or the actions I take.  (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: I am willing to sacrifice my immediate happiness or well-being in order to achieve future outcomes.
questions.smsText:
I am willing to sacrifice my immediate happiness or well-being in order to achieve future outcomes.
 (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: I think it is important to take warnings about negative outcomes seriously even if the negative outcome will not occur for many years.
questions.smsText: I think it is important to take warnings about negative outcomes seriously even if the negative outcome will not occur for many years. (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: I think it is more important to perform a behavior with important distant consequences than a behavior with less-important immediate consequences.
questions.smsText: I think it is more important to perform a behavior with important distant consequences than a behavior with less-important immediate consequences. (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: I generally ignore warnings about possible future problems because I think the problems will be resolved before they reach crisis level.
questions.smsText:
I generally ignore warnings about possible future problems because I think the problems will be resolved before they reach crisis level. 
 (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: I think sacrificing now is usually unnecessary since future outcomes can be dealt with at a later time.
questions.smsText: I think sacrificing now is usually unnecessary since future outcomes can be dealt with at a later time. (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: I only act to satisfy immediate concerns, figuring that I will take care of future problems that may occur at a later date.
questions.smsText: I only act to satisfy immediate concerns, figuring that I will take care of future problems that may occur at a later date. (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)

questions.text: Since my day to day work has specific outcomes, it is more important to me than behavior that has distant outcomes.
questions.smsText: Since my day to day work has specific outcomes, it is more important to me than behavior that has distant outcomes. (1=extremely uncharacteristic,2=somewhat uncharacteristic,3=uncertain,4=somewhat characteristic,5=extremely characteristic)
